data.comment: Giovanni Ayroldi starts the match. Benevento with the kick-off in Rome.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 2, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Roma just outside Benevento's area.
Roma are coming forward and Lorenzo Pellegrini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Benevento a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a throw-in for Benevento, close to Roma's area.
In the minute 5, Goal! Gianluca Caprari gives Benevento a 0-1 lead in Rome.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Can Roma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benevento's half?
Benevento drive forward but Gianluca Caprari is judged offside.
In the minute 12, Lorenzo Pellegrini's header is off-target for Roma.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Roma.
Throw-in for Roma in the half of Benevento.
Throw-in high up the field for Benevento in Rome.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
Giovanni Ayroldi blows against Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula for offside.
In the minute 18, Roma have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Benevento.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Roma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Davide Santon for Roma is whistled offside.
In the minute 27, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Pedro of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Benevento.
Gianluca Mancini for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Pedro.
Lorenzo Pellegrini with an assist there.
In the minute 32, Pasquale Schiattarella (Benevento) has received a yellow card from Giovanni Ayroldi.
Free kick Benevento.
Roma's Roger Ibanez has been booked in Rome.
In the minute 33, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bryan Dabo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rome to check on Roger Ibanez, who is grimacing with pain.
Bryan Dabo is back on his feet again.
In the minute 35, Roma's Roger Ibanez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Goal! Edin Dzeko gives Roma a 2-1 lead.
Great play from Henrikh Mkhitaryan to set up the goal.
In the minute 36, Roma drive upfield and Davide Santon gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Giovanni Ayroldi waits before resuming play because Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento is still down.
Pasquale Schiattarella has recovered and rejoins the match in Rome.
In the minute 41, Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 44, In Rome Roma's Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula has run offside.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Roma to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
At Stadio Olimpico the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Benevento.
Important block from the Benevento defence as Leonardo Spinazzola fires in a strike for Roma.
At Stadio Olimpico, Roma are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma have kicked-off the second half at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 46, Roberto Insigne is replacing Iago Falque for the away team.
Roma's Leonardo Spinazzola gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In the minute 48, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Benevento's area.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Olimpico.
Benevento are pushing forward but Gianluca Caprari's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Penalty! Giovanni Ayroldi points to the spot, great chance for Benevento...
In the minute 53, Jordan Veretout is booked for the home team.
Goal! Gianluca Lapadula levels the match at 2-2.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 57, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Lorenzo Pellegrini for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 59, Benevento push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Bryan Dabo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Roma defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Rome, Edin Dzeko of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 60, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a Roma throw-in in Benevento's half.
In Rome Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula is caught offside.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 65, Edin Dzeko (Roma) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 65, At Stadio Olimpico, Davide Santon has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Roma have been awarded a penalty...
Lorenzo Montipo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 68, Lorenzo Montipo is back on the pitch.
Jordan Veretout smashes in a penalty at Stadio Olimpico. The score is now 3-2.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Benevento in the half of Roma.
The home team replace Jordan Veretout with Gonzalo Villar.
Roma make their second substitution with Bruno Peres replacing Davide Santon.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Roma.
Edin Dzeko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Benevento's Artur Ionita breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a second substitution, with Riccardo Improta replacing Bryan Dabo.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 77, Edin Dzeko puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-2.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan instrumental with a fine assist.
Carles Perez is replacing Pedro for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Roger Ibanez with Marash Kumbulla. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
Throw-in for Benevento close to the penalty box.
Free kick Benevento.
In the minute 82, Giovanni Ayroldi blows against Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan for offside.
In the minute 82, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Filippo Inzaghi is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Marco Sau replacing Gianluca Lapadula.
Perparim Hetemaj is on a sub for Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento.
Daam Foulon (Benevento) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Rome Roma attack through Henrikh Mkhitaryan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Giovanni Ayroldi awards Benevento a goal kick.
Benevento's Roberto Insigne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
In the minute 85, Borja Mayoral is replacing Edin Dzeko for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Marco Sau for Benevento drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Benevento make their fifth substitution with Christian Maggio replacing Daam Foulon.
Benevento are pushing forward but Riccardo Improta's finish is wide of the goal.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Roma a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Great finish from Carles Perez to give Roma a 5-2 lead.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-2.
